page.title: 07ECOLOGY Ponds
page.content: { }In our school grounds there is a {pond.}It is steep and deep because it used to be a clay pit.It has over 30,000 {fish }in it, such as perch, goldfish and fresh water eels.There are frogs and some newts.Around the pond there are many{birds;}mallard, swallows,wagtails and coots.There used to be a duck refuge in the middle of the pond but it sank.It was to stop the foxes getting the young. There are many{plants}and{trees}around it, from oak,hawthorn and willow to bullrushes, lillies, lady's-smock and buttercups. There are not many pond insects that we can find because of the fish.The school has cleared some of the scrub,now it is going to clear most of the fish and make the sides of the pond more shallow. We then hope other schools will be able to come and share in its study.
